name: Ultimate Wild White Tiger Simulator
description:
Stop wondering how it is like to be real tiger in natural jungle environment hunting for the prey. Know the feelings of playing as the Ultimate Wild White Tiger Simulator. A real tiger movements and natural instincts are added into this game. Run for prey, tear them apart and collect your share of food in the jungle. Tiger is one of the world's most feared animals in the jungle. A real wild tiger on the leash in the dynamic environment of forest safari. Experience the thrill of being an actual tiger in the while Wild Tiger hunter Simulator. A new concept of its kind. Take the challenging test to prove the command over the hunting skill. Compete with other predators.
Ultimate Wild White Tiger Simulator features:
• Realistic cheetah and tiger movements
• Fighting and attacking on the other animals.
• Run around the jungles to find the prey
• Stomp on the prey and count the score.
• Health bar shows the survival power and stamina of white wild tiger
• Use attack button to kill the animals under chase.
• Survival is the number one priority in the game
• Attack wrong and unmarked animals can backfire, so hunt only animals which you are supposed to.
